body_html:
Copy-paste of my answer on bazel-discuss to another similar issue:
"This means that something has killed Bazel during its run. I saw this behavior on some system where the memory of the OS was reaching the limit and the OOM killer was always choosing Bazel because it was the most memory consuming process."
body_text:

body:
Copy-paste of my answer on bazel-discuss to another similar issue:
"This means that something has killed Bazel during its run. I saw this behavior on some system where the memory of the OS was reaching the limit and the OOM killer was always choosing Bazel because it was the most memory consuming process."
